title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Veterans' Affairs Minister Darren Chester says the Australian public should “be proud of the way they provide taxes to support our veterans in the community”. Mr Chester told Sky News six new wellbeing centres are being established across the country where veterans can access essential services all in the one place. “We recognise that there’s a lot of work still required in terms of the reform of department of veterans' affairs – but we think we’re heading in the right direction with it,” he said. Image: News Corp Australia
